commands.capture.help: Main capture command. Use /capture help for more info
messages.capture.contested-started: &7&l[&6&lâš &7&l]&r &6{zone}&7 is now &6contested&7 by &e{owners}&7 competing owner group(s) (&e{players}&7 players).
messages.capture.contested-ended: &7&l[&a&lâœ”&7&l]&r &a{zone}&7 is no longer contested. &e{town}&7 can continue the capture.
messages.reward.item.inventory-full-canc: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cYour inventory is full. Item reward for &e{zone}&c was skipped (&b{items}&c).
messages.koth.zone-activated: &7&l[&c&lKOTH&7&l]&r &e{zone}&7 is now active! Hold the hill for &f{time}&7 within &f{radius}&7 blocks.
messages.koth.reward.items-cancelled: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cKOTH item rewards for &e{zone}&c were skipped (inventory full).
messages.koth.reward.items-dropped: &7&l[&e&lâš &7&l]&r &eSome KOTH reward items were dropped on the ground.
reasons.moved-too-far: Player moved too far from capture zone
reasons.moved-too-far-player: {player} moved too far from capture zone
errors.no-permission: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cYou don't have permission to use this command.
errors.not-in-town: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cYou must be in a town to start a capture.
errors.already-controls-point: &7&l[&c&lâš &7&l]&r &cYour town already controls &e{point}&c; you cannot capture it again.
errors.capture-cooldown-active: &7&l[&c&lâ³&7&l]&r &e{point}&c was recently captured. Wait &e{time}&c before attempting again.
errors.capture-recapture-same-town: &7&l[&c&lâ›”&7&l]&r &cYour town already shares control affiliation for &e{point}&c. Recapture is blocked by zone policy.
errors.capture-recapture-same-nation: &7&l[&c&lâ›”&7&l]&r &cYour nation already shares control affiliation for &e{point}&c. Recapture is blocked by zone policy.
errors.capture-recapture-lock-owner: &7&l[&c&lâ›”&7&l]&r &cYour owner group recently lost &e{point}&c. Wait &e{time}&c before recapturing.
errors.capture-recapture-lock-attacker: &7&l[&c&lâ›”&7&l]&r &cYour owner group is temporarily recapture-locked at &e{point}&c. Wait &e{time}&c.
errors.concurrent-captures-disabled: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cAnother zone is already being captured. Concurrent captures are disabled.
errors.max-active-captures-reached: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cMaximum concurrent captures reached (&e{max}&c). Try again later.
errors.capture-outside-time-window: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cCapturing is currently outside this zone's allowed schedule.
errors.capture-weather-blocked: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cCurrent weather does not allow captures in this zone.
errors.capture-owner-cooldown: &7&l[&c&lâ³&7&l]&r &cYour owner group is on global capture cooldown. Time left: &e{time}&c.
errors.capture-disabled-during-events: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cStarting a new capture is disabled while another capture event is active.
errors.capture-koth-managed: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &c{zone} is managed by KOTH mode. Wait for a KOTH event and stand on the hill to capture.
errors.zoneconfig-set-invalid: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cFailed to set config value. Value may be invalid for this path.
errors.capture-not-found: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cNo active capture found for this point!
errors.koth-start-failed: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cCould not start KOTH event. Check zone selection and overlap settings.
errors.koth-stop-failed: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cNo matching active KOTH zone found to stop.
errors.koth-zone-not-found: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cNone of the specified zone IDs were found.
errors.koth-no-assigned-zones: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cNo KOTH-assigned zones are configured. Use &e/cap admin koth assign <zone_id>&c first.
errors.koth-zone-not-assigned: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cThese zones are not assigned to KOTH: &e{zones}
admin.koth.assigned: &7&l[&a&lâœ”&7&l]&r &aAssigned &e{zone}&a (&f{id}&a) to automatic KOTH zone pool. Total assigned: &e{count}&a.
admin.koth.unassigned: &7&l[&a&lâœ”&7&l]&r &aRemoved &e{zone}&a (&f{id}&a) from automatic KOTH zone pool. Total assigned: &e{count}&a.
admin.koth.assign.already: &7&l[&e&lâš &7&l]&r &eZone &f{id}&e is already assigned to automatic KOTH zones.
admin.koth.unassign.not-found: &7&l[&e&lâš &7&l]&r &eZone &f{id}&e is not assigned in automatic KOTH zones.
admin.koth.assign.mode-set-list: &7&l[&e&lâ„¹&7&l]&r &eKOTH activation mode was &fALL&e, switched to &fLIST&e so assigned zones are used.
errors.not-in-any-zone: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cYou are not in any capture zone!
errors.not-enough-players: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cAt least &e{minplayers}&c players must be online to start a capture!
errors.invalid-id: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cInvalid ID! Must be between &e1&c and &e32&c characters.
errors.invalid-type: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cInvalid type! Must be between &e1&c and &e64&c characters.
errors.id-exists: &7&l[&c&lâš &7&l]&r &cA capture zone with this ID already exists!
errors.create-failed: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cFailed to create capture zone. Check server logs.
errors.max-capture-points-reached: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cYou cannot create more than &e{max}&c capture zones. Increase &esettings.max-capture-points&c in config.yml if needed.
errors.min-point-distance: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cZone too close to another zone (&e{distance}&c chunks). Minimum required: &e{min}&c chunks.
errors.moved-too-far: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cCapture cancelled! You moved too far from the capture zone.
messages.create.cuboid-tool.instructions: &7&l[&e&lâ„¹&7&l]&r &7Left-click to set corner 1, right-click to set corner 2.
messages.create.cuboid-tool.waiting-seco: &7&l[&e&lâ„¹&7&l]&r &7Set the other corner to finish zone creation.
messages.create.cuboid-tool.completed: &7&l[&a&lâœ”&7&l]&r &aCuboid zone &e{id}&a created. Outline will fade shortly.
messages.create.cuboid-tool.no-target: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cLook at or click a block to select a corner.
messages.create.cuboid-tool.no-session: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cNo active cuboid tool session. Run &e/cap admin createcuboid <id> <type> <reward>&c first.
messages.create.cuboid-tool.world-mismat: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cBoth corners must be in the same world.
messages.create.cuboid-tool.drop-blocked: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cFinish cuboid selection before dropping the tool.
messages.create.cuboid-tool.item-dropped: &7&l[&e&lâš &7&l]&r &eInventory full. Selector tool was dropped at your location.
messages.zoneconfig-itemrewards-opened: &7&l[&e&lâ„¹&7&l]&r &7Opened item reward editor for &e{zone}&7. Place custom items, then close to save.
messages.zoneconfig-itemrewards.opened: &7&l[&e&lâ„¹&7&l]&r &7Opened item reward editor for &e{zone}&7. Place custom items, then close to save.
messages.zoneconfig-itemrewards-saved: &7&l[&a&lâœ”&7&l]&r &aSaved item rewards for &e{zone}&a: &f{stacks}&a stack(s), total amount &f{amount}&a.
errors.player-only: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cThis command can only be used by players!
errors.tp-disabled: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cYou can't do that right now. &e/cap tp &cis disabled in config.
errors.tp-no-active: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cThere are no active captures to teleport to.
errors.tp-invalid-zone: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cThat zone is not currently being captured.
errors.tp-unavailable: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cCould not teleport to that zone right now.
messages.tp.choose-header: &7&l[&e&lâ„¹&7&l]&r &eMultiple active captures found (&f{count}&e). Choose one with &f/cap tp <zone_id>&e:
gui.title: Capture Zones
messages.migration-success-exact: &7&l[&a&lâœ”&7&l]&r &aSchema repair completed. Missing keys/files were added and incompatible formats were fixed without overwriting valid values.
messages.migration-success: &7&l[&a&lâœ”&7&l]&r &aSchema repair completed. Missing keys/files were added and incompatible formats were fixed without overwriting valid values.
help.main.info: &7&lâ–¸&r &e/cap info <point> &7- Show info about a capture zone
help.main.tp: &7&lâ–¸&r &e/cap tp [zone_id] &7- Teleport to an active capture zone
help.admin.help: &7&lâ–¸&r &e/cap admin help &7- Show this admin help
help.admin.createcuboid: &7&lâ–¸&r &e/cap admin createcuboid <id> <type> <reward> &7(tool) or full coords &7- Create cuboid zone
help.admin.deletezone: &7&lâ–¸&r &e/cap admin deletezone <point> [CONFIRM] &7- Delete a capture zone
help.admin.stop: &7&lâ–¸&r &e/cap admin stop <point> [reason] &7- Stop an active capture
help.admin.reset: &7&lâ–¸&r &e/cap admin reset <point> &7- Reset a capture zone
help.admin.resetall: &7&lâ–¸&r &e/cap admin resetall &7- Reset all capture zones
help.admin.togglechat: &7&lâ–¸&r &e/cap admin togglechat <on|off> &7- Toggle capture chat messages
help.admin.repair: &7&lâ–¸&r &e/cap admin repair &7- Non-destructive schema repair (add/fix missing or invalid keys/files)
help.admin.migrate: &7&lâ–¸&r &e/cap admin migrate &7- Alias of repair (same non-destructive behavior)
help.admin.koth: &7&lâ–¸&r &e/cap admin koth <start|stop|status|assign|unassign|zones> [zones...] &7- Control KOTH events and assigned auto zones
gui.zoneconfig.itemrewards.title: &8Item Rewards: {zone}
messages.capture.not-in-town: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cYou must be in a town to capture zones!
messages.capture.not-in-nation: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cYou must be in a nation to capture zones in nation mode!
messages.capture.not-in-radius: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cYou must be within the capture zone boundaries!
messages.capture.already-capturing: &7&l[&c&lâš &7&l]&r &cThis capture zone is already being captured!
messages.capture.joined-own: &7&l[&a&l+&7&l]&r &aYou have joined your town's capture of &e&l{point}&7!
protection.block-break-blocked: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cYou cannot break blocks in protected zones!
protection.block-break-buffer-blocked: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cYou cannot break blocks in the buffer zone around capture zones!
protection.block-place-blocked: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cYou cannot place blocks in protected zones!
protection.block-place-buffer-blocked: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cYou cannot place blocks in the buffer zone around capture zones!
protection.item-use-blocked: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cYou cannot use items in protected zones!
protection.home-blocked: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cHome commands are blocked in protected zones!
messages.chunk.protected-success: &7&l[&a&lâœ”&7&l]&r &aChunk protected! &7This chunk now has the same protection as a capture zone.
messages.command-blocked: &câš  That command is blocked in the {zone}!
messages.claiming-blocked: &câš  You cannot claim land or create towns near a capture zone!
messages.capture.death_broadcast: &7&l[&c&lâ˜ &7&l]&r &c{town}'s&7 capture of &6{zone}&7 cancelled! &c{victim}&7 was defeated by &4&l{killer}&7!
messages.capture.admin_cancelled: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &c{town}'s&7 capture of &6{zone}&7 has been &c&lcancelled by an admin&7!
messages.zone.boundaries-disabled: &7&l[&c&lâœ–&7&l]&r &cZone boundary visuals are disabled by configuration.
messages.deletezone.confirm: &7&l[&e&lâš &7&l]&r &eType &c/cap admin deletezone {zone} CONFIRM&e to permanently delete this zone.
messages.weekly.first-capture-bonus: &7&l[&a&l$&7&l]&r &a&lFirst Capture Bonus!&r &7You earned &a&l{amount}&7 for capturing &e{zone}&7 after the weekly reset.
